limericks.author: Anonymous
limericks.text:
A mouse in her room woke Miss DoudWho was frightened and screamed very loudThen a happy thought hit herTo scare off the critter
She sat up in bed and just meowed!

limericks.author: Anonymous
limericks.text: A dinosaur stomped into a mallwhere people are tiny and smallNow why did you thinkI was really extinctthe dinosaur roared with a drawl.

limericks.author: Anonymous
limericks.text: There was a fat cat on a matWho liked to chase mice named Pat.He chased them aroundAnd fell on the groundAnd smashed them until they were flat!

limericks.author: Anonymous
limericks.text: There once was a snake named LenaWho swallowed a concertinaAnd when she was squeezedWay up in the treesShe played the macarena.
